body_html: I'm not sure what your code looks like, but I'd suggest that you construct the Exporter object before starting training (which I assume is using a Supervisor and therefore calling Graph.finalize()...) to avoid this error. You can construct it immediately after constructing a tf.train.Saver.
body_text: I'm not sure what your code looks like, but I'd suggest that you construct the Exporter object before starting training (which I assume is using a Supervisor and therefore calling Graph.finalize()...) to avoid this error. You can construct it immediately after constructing a tf.train.Saver.
body: I'm not sure what your code looks like, but I'd suggest that you construct the `Exporter` object before starting training (which I assume is using a `Supervisor` and therefore calling `Graph.finalize()`...) to avoid this error. You can construct it immediately after constructing a `tf.train.Saver`.
